text: Luis Alberto Alejandro Aparicio Lacalle Pou (born 11 August 1973) is a Uruguayan lawyer and politician. Lacalle Pou was the 42nd President of Uruguay from 2020 until 2025. He ran as candidate for the National Party in the 2019 election. He is the son of former President of Uruguay, Luis Alberto Lacalle. In the 1999 general elections, he was elected representative for Canelones, serving the 2000-2005 term. He was re elected in 2004 and again in 2009. On 30 March 2014, Lacalle Pou launched his bid for the presidential candidacy. He lost in the second round of the election to Tabaré Vázquez. ==References== ==Other websites== * Representative Luis Alberto Lacalle Pou * Presidential campaign website * Biografy by CIDOB Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Uruguay Category:Uruguayan lawyers Category:Politicians from Montevideo
title: Luis Lacalle Pou
